settings.title: What types of sneakers do you offer?
settings.text: We offer fashionable sneakers for healthcare workers that prioritize comfort, style, and versatility. Our shoes are designed specifically for the fashion-conscious healthcare professional who values both practicality and style.

settings.title: Are your sneakers comfortable and supportive?
settings.text: Absolutely! We have received excellent feedback about the comfort and support of our sneakers. The Ortholite insoles and stretch polyamide upper material provide a winning combination of comfort and support that you'll have to experience for yourself.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange my sneakers if they don't fit or Idon't like them?
settings.text: Yes, if you are not satisfied with your sneakers please contact our customer support team and we will be happy to help you exchange them for a different size or return them at no cost to you.

settings.title: How long will it take for my sneakers to be shipped?
settings.text: Orders are usually shipped within 5-7 business days, and we offer shipping anywhere in the US,

settings.title: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.text: Currently, we do not offer international shipping

settings.title: How do I care for and maintain my sneakers?
settings.text: Our sneakers are washing machine friendly. Simply remove the laces and place them in a mesh laundry bag, Wash with cold water and mild detergent on a gentle cycle. Air dry the sneakers indoors, and avoid using fabric softener or bleach

settings.title: Do you offer a warranty or guarantee on your sneakers?
settings.text: Yes, we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee on our sneakers. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact our customer support team

settings.title: Can I track my order online?
settings.text: Yes, once you place your order, you will receive shipping and confirmation details vis email, including a tracking number that you can use to track your order.

settings.title: Do you offer any special financing options?
settings.text: Yes, we offer a convenient, interest-free payment plan through Shop Pay. You can make four payments of $32.25 to complete your purchase.

settings.title: How do I know what size sneakers to order?
settings.text: To ensure the best fit we recommend measuring your feet in centimeters and consulting our sizing chart to determine the perfect size for you.
